battle-axe.name: Battle Axe
battle-axe.description:
Standard battle axe. Inflicts regular damage, making it effective in various situations.
Powerful attack due to its weight, but one wrong swing leaves the wielder open, so timing and proximity to the enemy must be judged carefully.

butcher-knife.name: Butcher Knife
butcher-knife.description:
Giant butcher knife wielded by the Undead man-eating cook lurking in the Depths. More a tool for subduing and preparing live catches than an actual weapon.
Those who have faced this deadly blade have a deeper sense of how helpless prey must feel.

crescent-axe.name: Crescent Axe
crescent-axe.description:
Well-used old bronze battle axe with along hilt and a crescent-shaped blade.
One of the blessed weapons of the Way of White. The Crescent Axe is bequeathed to cleric warriors who have proven their faith.

gargoyle-tail-axe.name: Gargoyle Tail Axe
gargoyle-tail-axe.description:
Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church or patrolling Anor Londo.
Can be used as a bronze battle axe. Bends dramatically during large attacks, owing to its nature as a tail.
gargoyle-tail-axe.special_features: increases bleed, poison and toxic resistance.

golem-axe.name: Golem Axe
golem-axe.description:
An Axe born from the soul of the Iron Golem, guardian of Sen's Fortress who repelled countless heroes who sought Anor Londo.
Its powerful one-handed attack imitates the golem's blade of wind, but the heavy iron blade makes it quite unwieldy.

hand-axe.name: Hand Axe
hand-axe.description: Small hand axe. Appears identical to a lumberjack's tool, but has ideal weight and strength, and is easy to handle. One wrong swing leaves the wielder wide open, so timing and proximity to the enemy must be judged carefully.

black-bow-of-pharis.name: Black Bow of Pharis
black-bow-of-pharis.description:
The preferred black bow of the heroic archer Pharis.
Has a longer range than standard bows, but is more difficult to use. Without proper abilities, results will be underwhelming.

composite-bow.name: Composite Bow
composite-bow.description:
Composite bow emphasizing power. Requires more strength than standard bows.
However, its range is shorter, making it unfit for sniping.

darkmoon-bow.name: Darkmoon Bow
darkmoon-bow.description:
Bow born from the soul of the Dark Sun Gwyndolin, Darkmoon deity who watches over the abandoned city of Gods, Anor Londo.
This golden bow is imbued with powerful magic and is most impressive with Moonlight Arrows.

dragonslayer-greatbow.name: Dragonslayer Greatbow
dragonslayer-greatbow.description:
Bow of the Dragonslayers, led by Hawkeye Gough, one of Gwyn's Four Knights.
This bow's unusual size requires that it be anchored to the ground when fired. Only uses specialized great arrows.

goughs-greatbow.name: Gough's Greatbow
goughs-greatbow.description:
Greatbow used by Hawkeye Gough, of Lord Gwyn's Four Knights, for dragon slaying.
This bow is larger than even those used by the famed Dragonslayers. Only their leader, Gough, had the strength to handle it.

long-bow.name: Longbow
long-bow.description:
Large bow. Projectile weapon for experienced hunters. Equip arrows to use.
Hold bow and press L1 to aim. Aim for heads of humanoid foes. Press L2/R2 to change type of arrows.

short-bow.name: Short Bow
short-bow.description:
Small bow. Standard projectile weapon. Equip arrows to use.
Hold bow and press L1 to aim. Aim for heads of humanoid foes. Press L2/R2 to change type of arrows.

avelyn.name: Avelyn
avelyn.description: Repeating crossbow cherished by the weapon craftsman Eidas. Its elaborate design makes it closer to a work of art than a weapon. Intricate mechanism makes heavy damage possible through triple-shot firing of bolts, but in fact each bolt inflects less damage.

heavy-crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
heavy-crossbow.description:
Powerful large crossbow. While bows require both hands, a crossbow is held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.
Equip bolts to use. Press L2/R2 to change type of bolt.

light-crossbow.name: Light Crossbow
light-crossbow.description: Standard crossbow issued to soldiers. While bows require both hands, a crossbow is held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.

sniper-crossbow.name: Sniper Crossbow
sniper-crossbow.description:
Large crossbow with long distance used by Carim snipers. Often used with sniper bolts.
But while crossbows are normally easy to use, the Sniper Crossbow requires dexterity.

gravelord-sword.name: Gravelord Sword
gravelord-sword.description:
Sword wielded only by servants of Gravelord Nito, the first of the dead. Crafted from the bones of the fallen.
The miasma of death exudes from the sword, a veritable toxin to any living being.

murakumo.name: Murakumo
murakumo.description:
Giant curved sword forged using special methods in an Eastern land.
This unparalleled weapon cuts like a Katana but is heavier than a Nata machete. Requires extreme strength, dexterity, and stamina to wield.

server.name: Server
server.description:
A curved greatsword used in a mysterious ancient rite.
Imbued with a frightful occult energy which restores HP with each hit.
server.special_features: +7hp restored per hit. +30hp restored after attacking enemies during their death animations.

falchion.name: Falchion
falchion.description:
A mysterious item once worn by the Xanthous King Jeremiah, the legendary exile. No one knows where it came from.
It may be tattered, but its bright yellow color still stings the eyes.

gold-tracer.name: Gold Tracer
gold-tracer.description:
Curved sword used by the Lord's Blade Ciaran, one of Gwyn's Four Knights.
Ciaran brandishes her sword in a mesmerizing dance, etching the darkness with dire streaks of gold.
gold-tracer.special_features: parry replaced by off-hand attack. +30 bleed buildup per hit.

jagged-ghost-blade.name: Jagged Ghost Blade
jagged-ghost-blade.description:
Jagged blade wielded by New Londo ghosts. Violent thrust attack.
One of the cursed weapons. Inflicts damage to ghosts.
jagged-ghost-blade.special_features: damages ghosts. +30 bleed buildup per hit.

painting-guardian-sword.name: Painting Guardian Sword
painting-guardian-sword.description:
Curved sword of Anor Londo painting guards. Unique shape with flat tip.
The guardians, who strike down those who dare threaten the painting, attack in a continuous, circular dancing motion, a technique passed down through generations.

quelaags-furysword.name: Quelaag's Furysword
quelaags-furysword.description: A curved sword born from the soul of Quelaag, daughter of the Witch of Izalith, who was transformed into a chaos demon. Like Quelaag's body, the sword features shells, spikes, and a coating of chaos fire. Power affected by wielder's humanity.

scimitar.name: Scimitar
scimitar.description:
Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.
The scimitar's sharp slashing attacks are effective against cloth and flesh, but not against metal armor or tough scales.

shotel.name: Shotel
shotel.description:
Curved sword with sharply curved blade.
Created by Arstor, Earl of Carim. Requires great skill to wield, but evades shield defense to sneak in damage.
shotel.special_features: strong attack deals 50% of total damage if blocked.

bandits-knife.name: Bandit's Knife
bandits-knife.description:
This wide single-edged shortsword is the favorite of lowly thieves and bandits.
Primarily a slicing weapon, but highly effective when used for critical hits, such as after parrying or from behind.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description:
This standard small dagger has only a modest attack but can be jabbed in rapid succession, and is effective in critical hits such as after a parry or when stabbing in the back.
With both slash and thrust attacks this dagger is useful in various situations.

dark-silver-tracer.name: Dark Silver Tracer
dark-silver-tracer.description:
A dark silver dagger used by the Lord's Blade Ciaran, of Gwyn's Four Knights.
The victim is first distracted by dazzling streaks of the Gold Tracer, then stung by the vicious poison of this dagger.

ghost-blade.name: Ghost Blade
ghost-blade.description:
The ghosts of New Londo clutch this wickedly sharp dagger with their bony hands and make mincemeat of the living.
One of the cursed weapons which can inflict damage upon ghosts.

parrying-dagger.name: Parrying Dagger
parrying-dagger.description:
This dagger is useful after parrying and is normally equipped in the left hand.
A favorite of the knights of Carim, who are famous for fighting without a shield.

priscillas-dagger.name: Priscilla's Dagger
priscillas-dagger.description:
This sword, one of the rare dragon weapons, came from the tail of Priscilla, the Dragon Crossbreed in the painted world of Ariamis.
Possessing the power of lifehunt, it dances about when wielded, in a fashion reminiscent of the white-robed painting guardians.

caestus.name: Caestus
caestus.description:
The weapon augments one's bare hands with thick, studded leather.
The Caestus has a short reach, but quickly cools down. Amount of damage inflicted is dependent on its wearer's strength.

claw.name: Claw
claw.description:
A weapon formed by three sharped claws.
Attacks cause bleeding, and the wounds inflicted are not easily mended. Preferred weapon of the spooks of an Eastern land.

dragon-bone-fist.name: Dragon Bone Fist
dragon-bone-fist.description:
A weapon from the soul of the Iron Golem, guardian of Sen's Fortress who repelled countless heroes who sought Anor Londo.
The Gods fused the power of the soul with the great bones of the dragons, forming an appropriate core for the giant golem.

black-knight-greataxe.name: Black Knight Greataxe
black-knight-greataxe.description:
Greataxe of the black knights who wander Lordran. Used to face chaos demons.
The large motion that puts the weight of the body into the attack reflects the great size of their adversaries long ago.

demons-greataxe.name: Demon's Greataxe
demons-greataxe.description:
Carved from the bones of fellow demons. Wielded by the lesser Taurus demons.
This axe is imbued with no special power, but can merrily beat foes to a pulp, providing you have the strength to wield it.

dragon-king-greataxe.name: Dragon King Greataxe
dragon-king-greataxe.description:
This axe, one of the rare dragon weapons, is formed by the tail of the Gaping Dragon, a distant, deformed descendant of the everlasting dragons.
The axe is imbued with a mystical power, to be released when held with both hands.
dragon-king-greataxe.special_features: +20 magic and fire defense. two handed strong attack releases shockwave aoe effect. this attack uses 50 durability points.

greataxe.name: Greataxe
greataxe.description:
This greataxe is a veritable mass of iron. Its weight sends foes flying, but it makes it difficult to handle without inhuman strength.
Any miss makes one very vulnerable, as each swing requires the full force of the body.

stone-greataxe.name: Stone Greataxe
stone-greataxe.description:
Greataxe borne by the stone knights who guard the forest Sanctuary.
This greataxe, requiring inhuman strength to wield and more fitted to manual labor than battle, is nevertheless completely lethal.
stone-greataxe.special_features: two handed strong attack releases aoe effect. can be buffed.

demons-great-hammer.name: Demon's Great Hammer
demons-great-hammer.description:
Demon weapon built from the stone archtrees. Used by lesser demons at North Undead Asylum.
This hammer is imbued with no special power, but can merrily beat foes to a pulp, providing you have the strength to wield it.

dragon-tooth.name: Dragon Tooth
dragon-tooth.description:
Created from an everlasting dragon tooth. Legendary great hammer of Havel the Rock.
The dragon tooth will never break as it is harder than stone, and it grants its wielder resistance to magic and flame.

grant.name: Grant
grant.description:
A legendary weapon of the Way of White, granted to an Undead paladin long ago.
This mass of iron can only be lifted by those with inhuman strength, but it is blessed, and very effective against agents of Dark.
grant.special_features: two handed strong attack releases shockwave aoe effect. this attack uses 200 durability points.

great-club.name: Great Club
great-club.description:
Giant tree branch serves as a wooden club. Smashes enemies from upside the head.
The leaping attack is a trademark of clubs, and this giant club is no exception.

large-club.name: Large Club
large-club.description:
Large wooden club.
The giant Undead of Blighttown wield these clubs, which became poisonous from the influence of their surroundings.

smoughs-hammer.name: Smough's Hammer
smoughs-hammer.description: Great hammer from the soul of executioner Smough, who guards the cathedral in the forsaken city of Anor Londo. Smough loved his work, and ground the bones of his victims into his own feed, ruining his hopes of being ranked with the Four Knights.

abyss-greatsword.name: Abyss Greatsword
abyss-greatsword.description:
This greatsword belonged to Lord Gwyn's Knight Artorias, who fell to the abyss.
Swallowed by the Dark with its master, this sword is tainted by the abyss, and now its strength reflects its wielder's humanity.

bastard-sword.name: Bastard Sword
bastard-sword.description:
The standard greatsword is normally wielded with two hands due to its great weight.
Usually swung in arcs and effective against multiple foes. Far from ideal when fighting in tight quarters.

black-knight-sword.name: Black Knight Sword
black-knight-sword.description:
Greatsword of the black knights who wander Lordran. Used to face chaos demons.
The large motion that puts the weight of the body into the attack reflects the great size of their adversaries long ago.

claymore.name: Claymore
claymore.description:
This larger type of greatsword is normally wielded with two hands due to its weight.
This highly flexible greatsword can be used to attack in swings or thrusts.

flamberge.name: Flamberge
flamberge.description:
This greatsword with an undulating blade is the choice weapon of the slithering serpent men of Sen's Fortress.
This weapon is designed to flay the skin and causes heavy bleeding.

great-lord-greatsword.name: Great Lord Greatsword
great-lord-greatsword.description: Greatsword born from the soul of Gwyn, Lord of Cinder. As bearer of the ultimate soul, Gwyn wielded the bolts of the sun, but before linking the fire, divided that power amongst his children, and set off with only this great sword as his companion.

greatsword-of-artorias.name: Greatsword of Artorias
greatsword-of-artorias.description:
Sword born from the soul of the great grey wolf Sif, guardian of the grave of the Abysswalker Knight Artorias.
Sir Artorias hunted the Darkwraiths, and his sword strikes harder against dark servants.

greatsword-of-artorias-cursed.name: Greatsword of Artorias (Cursed)
greatsword-of-artorias-cursed.description:
Sword born from the soul of the great grey wolf Sif, guardian of the grave of the Abysswalker Knight Artorias.
The sword can damage ghosts, as it was cursed when Artorias joined a covenant with the creatures of the Abyss.

man-serpent-greatsword.name: Man-Serpent Greatsword
man-serpent-greatsword.description:
This single-bladed blood-stained greatsword is the choice weapon of the slithering serpent men of Sen's Fortress.
An ordinary human will have great difficulty swinging this heavy beast effectively.

moonlight-greatsword.name: Moonlight Greatsword
moonlight-greatsword.description:
This sword, one of the rare dragon weapons, came from the tail of Seath the Scaleless, the pale white dragon who betrayed his own.
Seath is the grandfather of sorcery, and this sword is imbued with his magic, which shall be unleashed as a wave of moonlight.
moonlight-greatsword.special_features: strong attack releases ranged magic wave. this attack uses 20 (one-handed) or 40 (two-handed) durability points.

obsidian-greatsword.name: Obsidian Greatsword
obsidian-greatsword.description:
This greataxe, one of the rare dragon weapons, is formed by the tail of the one-eyed black dragon Kalameet, the last of the ancient dragons.
The mystical power of its obsidian blade will be released when held with both hands.
obsidian-greatsword.special_features: two handed strong attack releases aoe effect. this attack uses 50 durability points. can be buffed.

stone-greatsword.name: Stone Greatsword
stone-greatsword.description:
The Stone Knights who guard the Darkroot Garden wield this moss-covered greatsword.
The same magic which created the Stone Knights is imbued in the sword. Unleash this power by wielding the sword with two hands.
stone-greatsword.special_features: two handed strong attack releases aoe effect which slows enemies. this attack uses 200 durability points.

black-knight-halberd.name: Black Knight Halberd
black-knight-halberd.description:
Halberd of the black knights who wander Lordran. Used to face chaos demons.
The large motion that puts the weight of the body into the attack reflects the great size of their adversaries long ago.

gargoyles-halberd.name: Gargoyle's Halberd
gargoyles-halberd.description:
Halberd of the gargoyle guarding the Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.
Perfectly standard bronze halberd without any special power.
gargoyles-halberd.special_features: increases bleed, poison and toxic resistance.

giants-halberd.name: Giant's Halberd
giants-halberd.description:
Large halberd made of old brass, used by the giant sentinels of Anor Londo.
Brass contains traces of lightning, but as the halberd is designed for the giant sentinels, its weight is unbearable.

great-scythe.name: Great Scythe
great-scythe.description:
Weapon with a long curved blade. Converted from a wheat-harvesting tool.
The magnificent sharp curved blade instills fear in opponents. Perhaps it is their survival instinct at work.

halberd.name: Halberd
halberd.description: Long-hilted weapon mixing spear and axe is difficult to handle, requiring both strength and dexterity. The Halberd has two elementary attacks: spear-like thrusting and large sweeping swings. However, one false swing and the wielder is left wide open.

lifehunt-scythe.name: Lifehunt Scythe
lifehunt-scythe.description: Scythe born from the soul of Priscilla, the stark white crossbreed trapped inside the Painted World of Ariamis. Even the Gods feared Priscilla's lifehunt ability, and in the hands of a mortal, its power will turn upon its wielder.
lifehunt-scythe.special_features: +50 bleed buildup per hit to enemies. +40 bleed buildup per hit to user.

lucerne.name: Lucerne
lucerne.description: Halberd with a large, hard beak-like protrusion. Inflicts thrust damage. Instead of thrusting like a spear, the wielder of the Lucerne aims to club the head with its hard beak.

scythe.name: Scythe
scythe.description:
Halberd with a large blade. Scythe adjusted for battle.
Designed especially for slicing. However, one false swing leaves one wide open.

titanite-catch-pole.name: Titanite Catch Pole
titanite-catch-pole.description: Weapon of the titanite demon, a faceless stone monster born from titanite slab. One of the enchanted weapons, perhaps from residual power of the titanite slab. Known for its leaping attack which comes smashing down on foes from above.

blacksmith-giant-hammer.name: Blacksmith Giant Hammer
blacksmith-giant-hammer.description:
Wooden hammer of the giant blacksmith in Anor Londo who handles lightning weapons.
The giant blacksmith forges with this wooden hammer, as it would be hazardous to handle lightning weapons with metals.

blacksmith-hammer.name: Blacksmith Hammer
blacksmith-hammer.description:
Metal hammer of Andre of Astora, blacksmith at the Old Church.
Can be used as a strike weapon, but better left in the hands of its talented owner.

club.name: Club
club.description:
A simple wooden club. This simple bladeless strike weapon is effective against most foes, is easily handled, and can break the guard of a shield.
However, a single miss makes one wide open, so timing and proximities are crucial.

hammer-of-vamos.name: Hammer of Vamos
hammer-of-vamos.description:
Metal hammer of Vamos, a skeleton blacksmith deep within the Catacombs who rarely speaks.
Can be used as a strike weapon, but better left in the hands of its talented owner.

mace.name: Mace
mace.description: Iron hammer with a protrusive pommel. Standard weapon for clerics. This simple bladeless strike weapon is effective against most foes, and can break the guard of a shield. However, one miss leaves one wide open.

morning-star.name: Morning Star
morning-star.description:
Hammer with a sharp spike on its pommel. One of the more barbaric cleric weapons.
The effect of these spikes makes this strike-based weapon also cause bleeding.

pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
pickaxe.description:
Traditionally a mining tool, but the hard cone of the pommel is effective in battle.
A downward swing of the Pickaxe can crush stone; a human head would be an afterthought.

reinforced-club.name: Reinforced Club
reinforced-club.description: A club with leather nailed to the pommel. The burg Undead merchant proudly peddles this club, but its reinforcement is shoddy. Indeed, its attack is stronger, but the club is no longer dependably sturdy.

warpick.name: Warpick
warpick.description:
Hammer with a large beak-shaped pommel. Originally a pickaxe; redesigned for battle.
This simple but deadly weapon hits heavily with thrust damage, such that it easily cracks metal armor.

chaos-blade.name: Chaos Blade
chaos-blade.description: A curved sword born from the soul of Quelaag, daughter of the Witch of Izalith, who was transformed into a chaos demon. This blade inherits only the chaotic nature of Quelaag, and has a unique speckled design. Blade wielder erodes along with opponents.
chaos-blade.special_features: -20hp per hit. +36 bleed buildup per hit. scales with humanity.

iaito.name: Iaito
iaito.description:
Katana forged in an Eastern land. The Katana is drawn from the scabbard at lightning speed, using an Iaijutsu technique.
Iajutsu allows the wielder to charge forward to swiftly cut down distant foes.

uchigatana.name: Uchigatana
uchigatana.description:
Katana forged in an Eastern land. Known for its brisk slashing motions.
The Uchigatana cuts beautifully and causes bleeding, but its blade is easily nicked.

washing-pole.name: Washing Pole
washing-pole.description:
Katana forged in an Eastern land. Very unusual specimen with a long blade.
The blade is extremely long, but as a result, quite easily broken.

channelers-trident.name: Channeler's Trident
channelers-trident.description:
Trident of the Six-eyed Channelers, sorcerers who serve Seath the Scaleless in collecting human specimens.
Thrusted in circular motions in a unique martial arts dance that stirs nearby allies into a bloodthirsty frenzy.
channelers-trident.special_features: two handed strong attack temporarily increases allies' damage. this attack uses 80 durability points.

demons-spear.name: Demon's Spear
demons-spear.description:
Carved from the bones of fellow demons. Wielded by the slim lesser Batwing demons.
The weapon of these chaos demons wandering Anor Londo are different from those of other chaos demons, and are imbued with lightning.

dragon-slayer-spear.name: Dragonslayer Spear
dragon-slayer-spear.description: Cross spear born from the soul of Ornstein, a Dragonslayer guarding Anor Londo cathedral. Inflicts lightning damage; effective against dragons. Two-handed thrust relies on cross and buries spear deep within a dragon's hide, and sends human foes flying.

four-pronged-plow.name: Four-Pronged Plow
four-pronged-plow.description:
Four-pronged Plow wielded by the wooden scarecrows, serfs of the forest Sanctuary.
The scarecrow serfs would not normally use these four pronged plows as weapons, but their sharpness makes them very deadly.

moonlight-butterfly-horn.name: Moonlight Butterfly Horn
moonlight-butterfly-horn.description:
Weapon born from the mystical creature of Darkroot Garden, the Moonlight Butterfly.
The horns of the butterfly, a being created by Seath, are imbued with a pure magic power.

partizan.name: Partizan
partizan.description:
Spear with a blade attached to a broad point. Boasts long reach, and can slice.
The wide range of this spear makes it adaptable to many situations. Its strength lies in its length, but in cramped quarters, this backfires, and slices ricochet off walls.

pike.name: Pike
pike.description: Long spear with a very long red hilt. Traditionally used by groups of soldiers. Specially designed for distance thrusting. Has the longest range of all non-projectile weapons, but its very length makes it somewhat difficult to handle.

silver-knight-spear.name: Silver Knight Spear
silver-knight-spear.description:
The silver knights of Anor Londo guard the city using this beautifully slender weapon.
The spear can be wielded by both hands in a focused thrust that uses one's body weight, or swung in a large sweeping motion.

spear.name: Spear
spear.description: Standard spear used commonly by soldiers. Long reach, and can be used with shield up. Effective against hard exteriors, and can hit for high damage at the right moment of an enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small, and it is easily blocked by shields.

winged-spear.name: Winged Spear
winged-spear.description: A long-hilted spear with a barbed point. Long reach, and can be used with shield up. Effective against hard exteriors, and hits for high damage at the right moment of an enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small, and it is easily blocked by shields

astoras-straight-sword.name: Astora's Straight Sword
astoras-straight-sword.description:
Straight sword of an unknown knight, likely one of Astora's superiors.
High-quality sword imbued with a powerful blessing.

balder-side-sword.name: Balder Side Sword
balder-side-sword.description:
The knights of the ancient kingdom of Balder wielded these rock-solid, long swords which are excellent for thrust attacks.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal, but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after a widespread outbreak of Undead.

barbed-straight-sword.name: Barbed Straight Sword
barbed-straight-sword.description:
The choice weapon of the infamous Darkwraith Kirk, also known as the Knight of Thorns for the gnarly spikes on his favorite weapon.
This frightful sword deals only thrust attacks, and causes heavy bleeding.

broad-sword.name: Broadsword
broad-sword.description:
An accessible sword which inflicts consistent regular damage and high slash damage, making it applicable to a variety of situations.
The horizontal sweeping motion makes this sword effective against multiple enemies.

broken-straight-sword.name: Broken Straight Sword
broken-straight-sword.description:
Half of the blade of this straight sword is broken off.
Only the completely Hollowed would even consider using this as a weapon.

dark-sword.name: Darksword
dark-sword.description:
The sword of the knights of the Four Kings of New Londo. Its blade is wide and thick, and it is wielded in an unusual manner.
When the Four Kings were seduced by evil, their knights became Darkwraiths, servants of the Dark who wielded these darkswords.

drake-sword.name: Drake Sword
drake-sword.description:
This Sword, one of the rare dragon weapons, is formed by a drake's tail. Drakes are seen as undeveloped imitators of the dragons, but in they are likely their distant kin.
The sword is imbued with a mystical power, to be released when held with both hands.
drake-sword.special_features: two handed strong attack releases ranged shockwave. this attack uses 30 durability points.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description:
Widely-used standard straight sword, only matched in ubiquity by the Shortsword.
An accessible sword which inflicts consistent regular damage and high slash damage, making it applicable to a variety of situations.

shortsword.name: Shortsword
shortsword.description:
This small straight sword is widely used, to an extent only matched by the longsword.
An accessible sword which inflicts consistent regular damage and high slash damage, making it applicable to a variety of situations.

silver-knight-straight-sword.name: Silver Knight Straight Sword
silver-knight-straight-sword.description:
The silver knights of Anor Londo guard the city using this beautifully slender weapon.
Its chain attacks, in which the wielder takes great advancing steps and makes use of his bodyweight, are deadly even in single hits.

straight-sword-hilt.name: Straight Sword Hilt
straight-sword-hilt.description:
The hilt of this lost sword was found discarded in the Undead Asylum.
Only slightly better than one's bare hands, and not recommended for extensive use. Be certain to find a replacement quickly.

sunlight-straight-sword.name: Sunlight Straight Sword
sunlight-straight-sword.description:
This standard longsword, belonging to Solaire of Astora, is of high quality, is well-forged, and has been kept in good repair.
Easy to use and dependable, but unlikely to live up to its grandiose name.

estoc.name: Estoc
estoc.description:
The largest of the thrusting swords. Can pierce an armored knight in one thrust.
The blade is also sharp, allowing slicing as well.

mail-breaker.name: Mail Breaker
mail-breaker.description:
Standard small thrusting sword. Unsharpened but pointed solid shaft can pierce tough armor.
Can be thrust using one's body, and is very effective for critical attacks.

rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.description:
Standard thrusting sword. Regular one-handed attack can be delivered with shield held up. Can parry with use of left hand.
Thrusting attacks pierce and are effective against foes with hard exteriors, but the wielder is left open to damage after a swing.

ricards-rapier.name: Ricard's Rapier
ricards-rapier.description:
A rapier with intricate decorations. Chosen weapon of the infamous Undead Prince Ricard. Ricard's exploits are told in a monomyth.
He was born into royalty, but wandered the lands in a fateful ill-conceived journey. He became Undead, and disappeared up North.

velkas-rapier.name: Velka's Rapier
velkas-rapier.description:
A symbolic, powerful thrusting sword used by the pardoner serving Velka, Goddess of Sin.
It is no mere symbol to be sure; the pardoner is an inhuman swordsman, and wields this enchanted blade with special sword technique.

black-knight-greatsword.name: Black Knight Greatsword
black-knight-greatsword.description:
Greatsword of the black knights who wander Lordran. Used to face chaos demons.
The large motion that puts the weight of the body into the attack reflects the great size of their adversaries long ago.

demon-great-machete.name: Demon Great Machete
demon-great-machete.description:
The lesser Capra demons use these greatswords in pairs. The blade is cast iron and hooked.
The sword is imbued with no particular magic, but for those who have the strength, its great weight will smash foes mercilessly.

dragon-greatsword.name: Dragon Greatsword
dragon-greatsword.description:
This sword, one of the rare dragon weapons, came from the tail of the stone dragon of Ash Lake, descendant of the ancient dragons.
Its great mystical power will be unleashed when wielded with two hands.
dragon-greatsword.special_features: +20 magic and fire resistance. two handed strong attack releases ranged shockwave. this attack uses 50 durability points.

greatsword.name: Greatsword
greatsword.description:
One of the gigantic straight greatswords.
Very few have what it takes to wield this incredibly heavy, damage-dealing monster. A favorite of the Knights Berenike, known for their heavy armor, and Black Iron Tarkus.

zweihander.name: Zweihander
zweihander.description:
One of the gigantic straight greatswords.
As the name suggests, the Zweihander is held with two hands, but its wielder must still be inhumanly strong. It is this great weight that sends foes flying when hit solidly.

guardian-tail.name: Guardian Tail
guardian-tail.description:
Sliced tail of the Sanctuary Guardian.
This flexible, spiked and highly poisonous tail would make a rather obnoxious weapon.

notched-whip.name: Notched Whip
notched-whip.description:
Whip with sharp spikes.
Only slightly effective against armor and tough scales, but quite formidable against enemies with exposed skin. Also causes heavy bleeding.

whip.name: Whip
whip.description:
Leather Whip. Not intended for battle.
Virtually ineffective against armor and tough scale, but quite formidable against enemies with exposed skin.
